original_title: 1448 รักเรา..ของใคร
overview: Pim is unsatisfied with her man and when he chooses to leave her to study abroad, she makes sure all ties with him are cut. Enter another woman, Pat. The two women embark on a relationship almost too quickly. They go as far as having a wedding, in which Pat's parents refuse to attend.
tagline: A girl-on-girl relationship is something men would never understand
title: 1448 Love Among Us
